column1: Data collection in progress by Jeremy Pressman (@djpressman, U of Connecticut), Erica Chenoweth (@EricaChenoweth, Harvard U), and Jay Ulfelder (@JayUlfelder, Harvard U).
With thanks to Chereece Burrell, Emma Cooper, Elannah Devin, and Victoria Wang for assistance.
We are collecting this data in the public interest and to further scholarly research.
If you use these data, please cite the Crowd Counting Consortium as the source.
To submit information about an action during this timeframe, please click here
